com.hellokaton.blade.mvc

类 WebContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hellokaton.blade.mvc.WebContext

  • public class WebContext
extends Object
    Blade Web Context

    Route logic current thread context request and response instance.

    biezhi 2017/6/1
